ygData.subject: Re: Area effect songs
ygData.msgSnippet: This isn t related to the first question but it has something to do with Area Effect songs so I figured I d continue with this header.  My part hunted
ygData.messageBody:
This isn't related to the first question but it has something to do with Area
Effect songs so I figured I'd continue with this header. My part hunted
Mistmoore for the past 3 days and we hunt right at the zone. Well...either
Mistmoore is bugged or my area song is hitting the npcs you hear casting
through the walls, because we have had trouble with those same npcs coming to
the zone and killing us all when we did nothing to provoke them. The AoE
songs I used were fear, lull, and denon's. My only conclusion is that my song
radius is reaching them, I tried to talk to a GM who just told me that higher
lvl dungeons need a bit of tweaking. If anyone has any other information I'd
love to hear from you.

Sincerely,

Summer Du'Soleil
Bardess of Rodcet Nife
